overview: Steven is unique in his ability to bridge both the business and technical worlds. With a strong engineering background, including a degree in Optoelectronics, Steven holds several successful global patents and has won many awards including prizes from the University of NSW for mathematical insight and ingenuity. Steven started Haltech Engine Management Systems in 1985 and was fundamental in developing Haltechâ€™s export sales. Haltech went on to win a NSW Export Award in 2009. Steven is a professional photographer and videographer and has produced many hundreds of corporate videos for blue chip companies including Microsoft, Makita, Unilever, Burns Philp, Goodman Fielder, Westfield, Australian Defence Forces, Network Ten, Australand, Fox and many more.
